div.a: Samuel Bissell Elementary School Distance Learning

br.span: Links to delivery methods of instructional assignments
Student assignments from March 17th - March 20th and March 30th. Also includes assignments for Samuel Bissell Elementary School students March 31st - April 3rd.

span.div: Students in Grades 4-12 should log in to Google Classroom for daily assignment information. Below are links to Google Classroom and the Parent's Guide to Google Classroom in PDF and video format.

a.onclick: ga('send', 'event', 'URL', 'Link', 'Parent's Guide to Google Classroom Video');

a.text-node: Click here if your student requires service on their TCSD Issued Student Chromebooks During School Closure

span.div: Governor Mike DeWine announced that all schools in Ohio will remain closed and that remote learning will continue for the duration of the 2019/2020 school year.

We want to give a great big “Tiger Shout Out” to all of our students for their efforts in learning from home! We know it is not easy, all that we ask is that our Tigers try their best! Know that your administrators, teachers, and support staff members miss you!

div.a: Please click here for a complete list of Blackboard Connect School Closure communications and updates from Superintendent Powers.

span.div: During the school closure for COVID-19, the Twinsburg City School District will continue to make breakfast and lunches available to students who are eligible for the Federal Free and Reduced-Price Meal Program or are residents of our school community and are experiencing financial hardship.

div.a: Please click here for more information.
